meanings.sent1: The dark clouds signify an approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The ringing of the bell could signify the start of a race.
meanings.sent4: The sudden silence in the room seemed to signify trouble.
meanings.sent5: The red traffic light will signify that you must stop.

meanings.sent1: Good manners signify respect for others.
meanings.sent2: Her actions signify her commitment to the cause.
meanings.sent3: His favorite hat may signify his lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the garden seems to signify strength and endurance.
meanings.sent5: The trophy will signify your achievement in the competition.

meanings.sent1: The ancient symbols signify the history of the civilization.
meanings.sent2: The smoke signals signify a call for help.
meanings.sent3: The paw prints in the snow could signify a playful dog's presence.
meanings.sent4: The changing colors of the leaves signify the arrival of autumn.
meanings.sent5: The raised hand will signify your desire to speak in class.
